item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:8, topic:96569”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=139227.msg1338902#msg1338902 date=1179564598]

serach for 135 in your servers files and where it says max elvel, change it to 99.

dont bother posting with advice like that lol. its kinda common sence to do that. hes asking help on were to find it.

I told him where to find it. if we tell him everyonthing, then how is he learning?
[/quote]

I’m pretty sure that he won’t learn anything using ctrl+f to find “135” plus there’s a ton of 135s in client.java, seeing as it find ALL 135s, even if they are like 2135 or 1357 or something…[/quote]

ther aren’t that many 135’s in mine lo. I checked.

Read full topic

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You should see

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 135;
}[/code]

Just change both 135s to 99.

Read full topic
